thread.section_title: Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cosy hotel, perfect location
thread.title_full: Cosy hotel, perfect location - Review of Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Hege K
title: Cosy hotel, perfect location
text: A very cosy hotel - nice and warm. Which is a good thing in February. The staff was very helpful and gave good advice/help. Location is perfect - quiet area with several good restaurants nearby. Especially a small place specialising in "hot pot" and the best beer ever! It is also close to the subway - by far the best transportation in Beijing. Super hotel and location for us - 2 children and 2 adults.
